summary: Registered at the Chamber of Commerce & Buma/Stemra. Releases on a.o. Universal, Revealed recordings, Future House Music and Smash The House under different artist names. Currently hit 1.500.000 Spotify streams with alias 'Reynor'. Other activities include ghost production, teaching in FL Studio and DJ Sets.
Worked in a team at a.o. Lelies Teelt Ell, C1000 Stramproy, Geelen Counterflow and Restaurant de Luifel.
